channel.title: Hypnosis
channel.description:
Yesterday i downloaded a hypnosis cd. I put it on my mp3 and when i was going to sleep i listened to it. About 3 or 4 minutes i started feeling strange. I felt very strange on the back of my head, and my hands were feeling weird. I quickly stopped and turned the lights on as i was scared something strange would happen.
Now my question is if this is supposed to happen?And if it's dangerous to do something like that?
Here's the download link : http://rapidshare.com/files/15842096/nick_hanlon_hypnosis_cd_-_social_confidence_induction_jan_2004_-_relaxation_shyness_social_anxiety_p.html

item.title: Hypnosis
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I believe in hypnotism because I have seen it first hand many times. Paul Royter comes to our town often and does hypnosis on volunteers. Several of my friends, and one of my friend’s dad have been hypnotized by him, and he got them doing all sorts of wacky things. Then it’s always hilarious showing them the video after wards.

Read full topic

item.title: Hypnosis
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

[quote=“s1aped, post:30, topic:57018”]idoser did nothing to me and i dont see why people dont go buy some weed if they wana get high[/quote] Rofl, not all people know where to get weed. Lol, why buyin weed when you can be “hypnotised” for free ? Lol, I don’t believe in hypnotise and ghost stuff etc. I do believe in orgasms lol But I know a guy who SAYS he was meditating, and suddenly he resigned… I don’t belive him … but it’s pretty dangerous tho. I’m kinda affraid of things like that… Just because I don’t belive in it

Read full topic

item.title: Hypnosis
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

Weed does the exact same thing as a cigarette except it has THC in other chemicals in it that make you hallucinate & such.

Basically it’s a heavier cigarette that will make you have problems with memory and learning; distorted perception (sights, sounds, time, touch); difficulty in thinking and problem solving; loss of coordination; and increased heart rate, anxiety, and panic attacks.

Unless it’s laced with something your not going to die of anything but cancer But… It’s also a gateway drug so you’ll most likely start doing other drugs that can do more harm to you.

Read full topic

item.title: Hypnosis
item.dc:creator: @The_Cursed The Cursed
item.description:
@The_Cursed wrote:

[quote=“Cabby, post:22, topic:57018”]Uhh, That just scared me now lol… What do you mean?

EDIT::
I’m watching my nephew, hes sleeping. The heater has been on in the basement. I was upstairs I played the song, and my nephew woke up… I wnet down there and it was freezing?[/quote]
i think it was coincedence , but how long did you listen to the “song”?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2007, 11:05:51 AM[/size][hr]seems like nobody wants to test it out?
I guess i’ll do it myself. If this is what i have to do to improve my life, then i’m definatly going to do this.
Expect a reply tommorow[br][size=1]Posted on: February 10, 2007, 01:10:23 PM[/size][hr]Ok i’ve done it but i dont know if this has changed me. I listened to it last night and like usual, i was feeling weird again. It feels like you’re not thinking about anything else, just the voice and you . Though i do not know if it helped me become more confident and social in life. If everyone else wants to try it, the download link is on the first page. When you are done listening to it just post what effects it had on you and when there are allot of posts we will come to a conclusion if hypnosis really works or not

Read full topic

item.title: Hypnosis
item.dc:creator: @The_Cursed The Cursed
item.description:
@The_Cursed wrote:

[quote=“93dcthugs93, post:14, topic:57018”][quote author=The Cursed link=topic=80869.msg885092#msg885092 date=1171135318]

Rofl, kinda off topic but on the web somewhere theres a video of people having orgasm’s in their sleep. I think it’s real/not real, but who gives a shit? It’s fucking hilarious.

& a note they are all dressed & at a show

That’s called a wet dream, i think its because you didnt have sex (mastrubate) in a long time, so there is so much sperm in your balls it just kind of pops out when you have a dreams where it involves sexual things and such.
I could be wrong, but thats what i learned at school

Oh and by the way im uploading the hypnosis thingy
Currently 31% uploaded
[/quote]

I know what I’m talking about and why do you assume it’s only guys? & a wet dream is when your asleep.

Thanks.[/quote]
you said it yourself : “people’s having orgasmes in their sleep”
And i think it would be the same thing with women
